channel.title: Boring Posts on Trenton Broughton

item.title: Simple OS X XKCD client with Automator
item.description: I am a big fan of the xkcd comics, and was toying with different ways to view the current comic directly. At one point, I built a complicated flow to put the current comic on my desktop using Geek Tool, but I wanted something I could just open periodically. Finally, I decided to give Automator a try. Turns out, it’s incredibly simple. Here is my final flow: Simple enough! You can find those two actions under the Internet section in the Library:

item.title: Handy Sale Advertisement Guide.
New day, new attempt
item.description: Just finished a little work with liquidluck. i hadn’t heard of it before, but zigg mentioned it, so i thought i would give it a try. Honestly, i wasn’t really sure about yet another static site generator, but so far i am impressed. Now if only i can keep writing things down. i will also hopefully get the template i made for it packaged up. i’m not completely satisfied with it, but it will keep me going for the time being.
